General.Name: Dogan Burda Dergi Yayincilik ve Pazarlama AS
General.Description: Dogan Burda Dergi Yayincilik Ve Pazarlama A.S. publishes magazines in Turkey. It publishes approximately 50 magazines in computer and technology, decoration, youth, travel and exploration, human, business and economy, corporate, life and style, fashion and women, special interest, and health and fitness categories in printed and digital formats. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
